content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: clay
inventory=[{"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft clay, I need to place 4 clay_balls in the crafting grid. I will move 1 clay_ball from slot 27 to slot 1 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: clay
inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: I have moved 1 clay_ball into the crafting grid, so I will move another 1 clay_ball from slot 27 to slot 2 in the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 2, "index": 27}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

Ok
act: move from slot 27 to slot 4 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]

TASK: Craft an item of type: clay
inventory=[{"type": "clay", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "clay_ball", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass", "quantity": 18, "index": 12}, {"type": "saddle", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 31}, {"type": "mossy_cobblestone_wall", "quantity": 47, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 30, "index": 35}, {"type": "dead_fire_coral", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "chainmail_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that I have placed 4 clay_balls in the crafting grid, I can craft clay. I will move the clay from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 13).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 13 with quantity 1
